attributes.action: Allow all UK citizens equal rights to NHS treatment whatever country they reside in.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present UK citizens resident in England have reduced rights to NHS treatments than citizens resident in Wales & Scotland. All English citizens ask is for the same level of benefit as other UK residents. For example Scottish residents have free prescriptions and greater access to treatments and drugs denied to residents in England.
